goal.title: Paris History Documentary - Development Phase
goal.target: Creative brief locked, budget confirmed, tech validated

features.description: Logline + thesis + 3-act outline + runtime target for 'History of Paris' documentary. Define the hook: micro-history, cultural thread, or migration story. Ready for PK/Sam/Pete review call.
1-page budget stub with stages: Development / Production / Post / Festival & Distribution / Contingency. Include in-kind Utopia contributions.
1-day tech validation run-of-show: remote direction <1s latency, Situs/CITUS lighting automation, multicam ingest → Blackmagic → OBS, same-day rough assembly (15-30min cut). Include backup paths.
Checklist for: archival photos, music clearances, footage rights, interview releases. Initial list of 3 archives to approach (national, local museums, private collections).
Email templates: (a) archive access request, (b) interview invite for subject matter experts, (c) broadcaster/festival tease with sizzle ask.
Sam's input: 3 festivals + 3 broadcasters to target. Include cut length preferences, submission deadlines, contact info.
Social post celebrating Utopia/Bearsville heritage. Connect to legendary recordings and current capabilities.
Short video showcasing API AXS Legacy console and cathedral acoustics. Heritage meets innovation angle.
One-page PDF for artist residency program. Include pricing, amenities, sample schedule, booking process.
